name: Basicare Rectangular Foundation Sponge
description:
These sponges are made of NBR (NITRILE BUTADIENE RUBBER) to provide a smooth blending and even application for liquid, cream and powder foundation. With its fine texture, this sponge offers the maximum control and flawless finish to your cosmetic application. CARE: Gently wash the sponge in warm soapy water. Rinse thoroughly and squeeze for excess water. Allow it to air dry.
*Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
